name: Goristro
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Charge: If the goristro moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 38 (7d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21+1d12 + 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked prone.
traits.Labyrinthine Recall: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.
traits.Magic Resistance: The goristro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Siege Monster: The goristro deals double damage to objects and structures.
